feed.title: The Helical Expeditions - BREAK!! Adventures
feed.description: WIP booklet of 3-4 page adventures for the BREAK!! TTRPG, set across the Outer World's locations. New adventures published as they are completed.
feed.author: Quagg Studio

adventures.title: Deal with a Sea Witch
adventures.description: Dive into the depths of the Sunken Isles where an ancient sea witch holds court. Navigate treacherous underwater ruins and negotiate with creatures of the deep.

adventures.title: Danger for a Rokko-Do
adventures.description: A beloved rokko-do (a gentle beast of burden) has gone missing in the treacherous Winding Pass. Can you brave the dangers to rescue it?

adventures.title: Thunda Circuit
adventures.description: Race through the scorching Thunda Sands in this high-octane adventure featuring mechanical beasts and desert outlaws.

adventures.title: Crash Landing!
adventures.description: A vessel has crashed in the monster-infested Death Valley. Rescue the survivors before the colossal creatures of No-Folk Land claim them.

adventures.title: Sinking the Float Stone Mine
adventures.description: Investigate strange happenings at a float stone mine. Something sinister lurks in the depths, threatening to bring the whole operation crashing down.

adventures.title: Hold the Wall
adventures.description: Stand with the defenders of Aiden against the Hollow Queen's relentless forces. A desperate battle on the ancient Red Wall that divides civilization from darkness.

adventures.title: Prickly's Prickly Situation
adventures.description: A perfect starter adventure! Help a friendly cactus creature deal with some unexpected trouble on the Cereus Plateau.

adventures.title: Of Cats and a Rat
adventures.description: In the orderly streets of Nyanko, home of the Rai-Neko, a cunning rat has upset the delicate balance. Unravel the mystery in this feline-themed urban adventure.
